RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MON PARADIS was off a bit slow and trailed early, rallied in the stretch and angled out three wide, closed determinedly and was up in the last jumps. SILVER STICK STAIR dueled on the lead throughout, held grudgingly and just missed. CALTHA dueled on the lead from the inside and weakened late. MYRRH raced between horses early and was in tight, steadied on the turn, then went evenly late. WILLYMAR was in tight early and had to steady, rallied at the quarter three wide, put in her bid and flattened out in the stretch. TARA DAWN was outrun. THIS RACE WAS HAND TIMED. The rider of of MYRRH claimed foul against the riders of CALTHA and SILVER STICK STAIR for alleged interference down the backside. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced between horses and was in tight, steadied at the three eigh

ENTRY.OWNER: Young Thomas J and Acevedo Israel

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUBLE EDGED pressed the early pace, rallied three wide in the stretch and prevailed after a long stretch battle. RUNLIKEJACKIEO had good position early, dropped back slightly on the turn, rallied on the rail in the stretch and gained a slight lead, held grudgingly and just missed. MOBIL CHIC was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch four wide and finished well. DIAMONDS N DEW set the pace until mid stretch, then faltered late. KERRI'S MIRACLE tracked four wide and had no rally. LUCKY PENNY ROSE was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WELLER ROGUE was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch four wide, closed fast and drew off under firm handling. VALHALLA AIR BASE stalked the early pace, rallied in the stretch and gained a slight lead, was no match for the winner late but was second best. EL SICARIO dueled early, chased the speed for three quarters, rallied in the stretch and drew close, then flattened out late. TWICE AS SMART allowed to settle, failed to menace. DAAHER STREET was unhurried early and was no threat. ICON was rank early and opened up a clear lead, bore out on the far turn and weakened in the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $22,000 Since January 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highest Earnings 2022-2023 Preferred)(Ohio Reg istered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREE SAILIN was never far back, rallied on the turn and gained the lead, remained clear in mid stretch and lasted late under firm handling. FIRST CITIZEN had good position early, dropped back slightly on the turn, angled out five wide in the stretch and closed fast. NAUGHTY PRINCE contended throughout and finished willingly in a good effort. GRAYWING had good position early, remained a sharp factor in mid stretch, lacked a late response.. LIKEABLE set the early pace, saved ground and weakened late. FLAT FUN was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEEYOUINMOTOWN had good position early, rallied in the stretch and drew even, drew clear late under strong handling. MY PINK BUNNY TALE set the pace with a clear lead, was hooked in mid stretch, could not match strides late with the winner but was second best. MIZZEN THE POINT missed the break and trailed early, rallied on the turn four wide, closed willingly in a good effort. PRONTO CHARLI had good position on the inside and went evenly late. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT raced mid pack and was no threat. WICKED REESE chased the speed and was through after a half. OH EYE SEE had good position on the inside and had no rally. DEE'S KY WILDCAT saved ground and was no menace. AUGMENTING ASSETS was no factor.

Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIGZ TOO was never far back, rallied three wide on the turn and drew close, drew clear late under strong handling. CLAW was well placed early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch, finished well and was up for place. TOE TAPPIN LUKE set the pace and dueled on the lead, held well in the stretch drive. CUMBER vied for the lead until mid stretch, then faltered late. SCORSESE was off slowly and was outrun. UHAVETOBEKITTENME contended on the inside and was through after a half.

FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHANGHAI PRINCE dueled early, dropped back slightly in the stretch, came again late and drew clear under left handed urging. ELLE'SBIGSEACRET dueled on the lead from the inside, drew clear in mid stretch, was outfinished late but was second best. EL MARRO had good position three wide and went evenly late. BACHELOR PAD was never far back while racing four wide and was no menace late. JUSTIN'S QUEST allowed to settle, failed to menace. TOM'S LAST GENERAL was outrun.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAINT THE TOWN was unhurried early and trailed, rallied on the turn three wide with a quick move, drew off late under mild urging to win as much the best. BUCKEYE CHARLIE was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch four wide and was up for place. CONSTITUTION COAL dueled early, shook clear on the turn, faltered late.
